entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of wet flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of wet flurries early this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
